title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars - Planets in Peril
description: DK Readers team up with Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars yet again to get Padawans excited to read! Perfect for reluctant readers as well as devoted Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars fans, DK's Star Wars Readers have sold over 2.5 million units! Planets in Peril focuses on the newest worlds from the Clone Wars universe, and how they're being affected by the fighting. Â© 2010 Lucasfilm Ltd. and TM. All Rights Reserved. Used Under Authorization.
author: Bonnie Burton
